page.title: 18Codnor Gate Industrial Est.
page.content: The industrial estate is actually in Ripley on three roads, High Holborn Road,Brittain Drive and Forty Horse Close. There are twenty units. Ten companies actually make things there and the others provide services, finish off products made elsewhere or store goods to be sent to shops. The Nuthall Lighting Company also sends materials out to people for them to make lampshades at home. I think two factories are empty because they have gone bankrupt, but there is still space to build more factories. I think it is a good idea to have factories on an estate away from houses because of the smoke, noise and traffic they cause. I don't find it an attractive place, but I like the Riley Dental Laboratories' building best because of the brickwork. {AA
